title: Change at the top of Rothschild Australia
text:
Rothschild has appointed senior investment banker Marshall Baillieu as sole head of its Australian advisory team.

It is understood Baillieu picked up the title of country head of corporate advisory earlier this week.

He was formerly co-head with fellow senior banker Gareth Cope. However it is understood Cope has left the firm.

Rothschild's local team advised Asahi on its $16 billion bid for Carlton & United Breweries. Bloomberg

It comes at a busy time for Rothschild with the firm sitting third on the Australian announced M &A league table this year.

Its No.3 spot is thanks to its role in helping Asahi buy Carlton & United Breweries for $16 billion. The deal was signed in July.
description: Rothschild has appointed senior investment banker Marshall Baillieu as sole head of its Australian advisory team.
